Posts.Content: Hello everyone  Im pretty new to all this but am also just starting on T first one was 11th may. so day +2 and feeling.... well not too bad bit of aches and hot feet but all pretty mild so far so good.   I must say it has been a great help over the past few months to read all comments and advice thank you all My skin has started to peel at the tops of my fingers and is very sensitive  any advice other than the usual hand cream. or just the joy of docetaxel Hang in there everyone we can do this!!!! Di
Posts.Title: Docetexal
